official-title.#text:
To amend the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956 to require congressional notification
			 not less than 15 days after a reward is authorized under the Rewards for
			 Justice Program of the Department of State, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Rewards for Justice Congressional Notification Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Rewards for Justice Congressional Notification Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 36 of the State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956/s:36

text.#text: in subsection (g), by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall
			 submit to the appropriate congressional committees a report, which may be
			 submitted in classified form if necessary, detailing information about the
			 reward, including the identity of the individual for whom the award is
			 being made, the amount of the reward, the acts with respect to which the
			 reward is being made, and how the reward is being publicized.

text.#text: Not less than 15 days after a reward is authorized under this section, the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
on or after the date of the
			 enactment of this Act.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
section 36 of the
			 State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: State Department Basic Authorities Act of 1956/s:36

text.#text:
The amendment made by subsection (a)(1) takes effect on the date of the enactment of this Act and
			 applies with respect to any reward authorized under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 5685 IH: Rewards for Justice Congressional Notification Act of 2014
